Class UserService

java.lang.Object
us.jbec.lct.services.UserService
Direct Known Subclasses:
DevelopmentUserService
@Primary @Profile("!dev") @Service public class UserService extends Object
Service for interacting with authenticated users

  • Method Details

    • getAuthorizedUserByToken

      public AuthorizedUser getAuthorizedUserByToken(String encodedToken) throws com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseAuthException
      Given an encoded token, lookup the corresponding AuthorizedUser (if one exists). If the user does not already exist, a new user is created and assigned to the default project with the User Role, provided the user's email is an @uconn.edu email
      Parameters:
      encodedToken - encoded token to decode and to then use for user lookup
      Returns:
      the AuthorizedUser
      Throws:
      com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseAuthException

    • getUserByFirebaseIdentifier

      public Optional<User> getUserByFirebaseIdentifier(String uuid)
      Find a User (if one exists) from the database using a decoded firebase UUID
      Parameters:
      uuid - Decoded firebase UUID to use for the user lookup
      Returns:
      optionally return the user for the given firebase UUID

    • userExistsByEmail

      public boolean userExistsByEmail(String email)
      Check if user exists with provided email
      Parameters:
      email - email to check
      Returns:
      if the email corresponds to an existing user

    • retrieveUserPrefs

      public UserPrefs retrieveUserPrefs(User user)

      Returns:
